_comment: Example client: ACME Corp internal users.

users.description: Administrator account with access only to all resources. **Expected Activity:** RDP connections from VPN pool (10.10.20.0/24) are normal and expected for remote administrative access. Alerts for 'Malicious RDP Connection' involving this account from VPN IPs should be reviewed but are typically false positives if no IOC matches and activity matches expected admin access patterns.
Dedicated admin account for Jane Smith used only for privileged actions.
Shared IT operations admin account (ideally should be replaced with per-user admin accounts).
Service account used by ACME-BACKUP-SRV01 to perform backup tasks.
Service account used by monitoring/alerting tools.
Contractor account with access only to specific project resources.
